name: resolveCallType(for:with:)
desc: Resolves the search criteria for the call type.DeprecatedThis intent is no longer available. You may define a custom intent instead. For more information, see Deprecated SiriKit Intent Domains.
declaration:
optional func resolveCallType(for intent: INSearchCallHistoryIntent, 
                         with completion: @escaping (INCallRecordTypeResolutionResult) -> Void)
